channel.title: Methodologies on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Methodologies on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: How to Learn Backend Development
item.description: This tutorial will introduce how to learn backend development. (Python, Java, Ruby, C#, PHP, Monolithic architecture, Microservices architecture, Serverless architecture, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Security, Performance)

item.title: How to Learn Frontend Development
item.description: This tutorial will introduce how to learn frontend development. (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sublime Text, Atom, Visual Studio Code, React, Angular, Vue.js)
